name: Mercurial Luminance
description:
Developed Feb 23 - Apr 19, 2020

Project lead, core gameplay, particle systems, expressive AI motion, player control, models, level design, tree animation: Justin Chin

Camera smoothing, movement refactor, jitter fix: Powerproust

Intro manager ("Ken Burns" functionality), zoom support: Rami Bukhari

Music and related integration, sound improvements: Klaim (A. Joël Lamotte)

Fairy detection script, tree orbit functionality: Mohamed AbdAllah

Camera raycast fix, placeholder tree, initial sounds, compiled credits, intro image creation: Chris DeLeon
